name: Pack of Memories
description:
"The nightmares don't ever stop. I can keep on recalling the past but I can't remember anything. The war... My inner war... it was never over to begin with"

--------------------------------------------------------------

Play as a soldier fighting his inner demons and unravel the mystery in his subconscious. Defeat the ghosts in each level to get a clue from a pack of files. Get all the cards in the pack to complete the story. However, do beware of the time limit. Once time runs out, it's all over for you.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Mouse Click - Shoot

R - Reload
